mapper.select: select * from reserve join roomregister on reserve.roomRegister=roomregister.id join room on roomRegister.room=room.id where room.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roomType},'%')
select * from reserve join roomregister on reserve.roomRegister=roomregister.id join room on roomRegister.room=room.id where room.floor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{floor},'%')
select * from reserve where reserve.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reserveStatus},'%')
select * from reserve join roomregister on reserve.roomRegister=roomregister.id where roomregister.guestName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reserveGuestName},'%')
